text: Ri Jong-song (born 27 January 1982) is a North Korean gymnast. He competed in three events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:North Korean male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of North Korea Category:Gymnasts at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Gymnasts at the 2006 Asian Games
title: Ri Jong-song
